title: Interface scaling
body: after rescaling the game to a different size, I am unable to see the bottom portion of the screen to start games, or see any of the bottom of the screen. this is an exact replica of my screen as i see it. any suggestions on how to fix this issue? there is no "stretch" option available to rescale to my specific specifications.

replies.body:
Try this fix, it should work to override the Windows 10 scaling problem:

1. Right-click League
2. Go to Properties
3. Go to the Compatibility tab
4. Underneath Settings, check the [Disable fullscreen optimizations] box
5. Apply the changes and try launching League again.

We're aware of a scaling issues that some players are experiencing on Windows 10. Please post your Windows 10 version (i.e. 1703, 1803, 1909), monitor resolution, and Windows Display scale setting. Usually, changing the Windows Display scale to 100% is a workaround.
